instruction: Arrange three sentences so that they make a coherent story.
input: He took the train home. He arrived at his stop. He had to buy a ticket.
output: He had to buy a ticket, so he took the train home. When he arrived at his stop, he got off the train.

instruction: Write a query to retrieve the name and score of students with a score greater than 90.
output: SELECT name, score FROM Students WHERE score > 90;

instruction: Rearrange the given poem so that it reads as an English sonnet.
input:
Eyes of silver, with a heart of gold, 
You have no trouble being in the world,
In the word of freedom your love shines like a star, 
Your spirit leads me to wherever you are.
output:
Eyes of silver, with a heart of gold,
Your spirit leads me to wherever you are;
In the word of freedom your love shines like a star, 
You have no trouble being in the world.

instruction: Write a blog post about why a smartphone tracking app is important.
output:
Smartphone tracking apps are essential in today's technology-driven world. From tracking your fitness activities, to helping locate your lost phone, tracking apps can provide numerous benefits to their users. Here are a few key reasons why a smartphone tracking app is important: 

1. Securing Your Device: With a tracking app installed, you can easily locate your device in case it’s lost or stolen. 

2. Protecting Your Data: With a tracking app, you can prevent sensitive data from getting into the wrong hands by remotely deleting it from the device.

3. Monitoring Activities: With the help of tracking apps, you can keep track of your kids or employees and make sure they are safe. 

4. Time Management: With a tracking app and its activity log, you can easily identify and eliminate time-wasting activities and manage your time better.

5. Productivity: With a tracking app, you can also keep a close eye on your employees to ensure they are being productive and doing their best work. 

With so many benefits, it's no surprise that more and more people are choosing to install a smartphone tracking app on their devices.

instruction: Could you summarize this article about art therapy in three sentences?
input: Art therapy is an innovative treatment approach that uses creative activities to address psychological issues. It's based on the idea that creating art can help individuals process and understand their emotions, navigate difficult times, and foster personal growth and development.
output: Art therapy is a form of psychotherapy that encourages individuals to use art as a way of self-expression and to work through their emotions. It can be used to explore one's creativity, to process difficult experiences and to facilitate personal growth. Art therapy is a safe and effective way to reflect on experiences, gain insight and build psychological resilience.

instruction: Name three benefits of playing board games.
output:
Playing board games can provide a range of benefits, such as: 
1. Improving problem-solving skills 
2. Increasing social skills 
3. Boosting creativity 
4. Enhancing memory 
5. Building emotional resiliency 
6. Developing strategic thinking 
7. Stress relief and relaxation

output: 今日は長い一日だった。

instruction: Identify the type of pronoun in the sentence "He will arrive by 5 pm"
output: The sentence "He will arrive by 5 pm" contains a personal pronoun ("He").

instruction: Design a comic strip about the importance of recycling
output:
Panel 1
[A person stands in front of a garbage can overflowing with trash.] 
Person: Ugh! The garbage can is overflowing again! 

Panel 2
[The person notices a sign taped to the garbage can that reads "Please recycle"] 
Person: Oh! I guess I forgot to recycle!

Panel 3
[The person is sorting trash into a recycling bin.] 
Person: Recycling is important to help keep our planet clean and reduce waste! 

Panel 4
[The person smiles.] 
Person: We all have a responsibility to take care of our environment!

instruction: Propose an interesting way to celebrate Earth Day.
output: How about hosting an Earth Day Carnival to celebrate Earth Day? Have different carnival games such as a recycling relay race, an air pollution obstacle course, and a nature scavenger hunt. Offer food dishes made of sustainable, local ingredients, and provide educational booths that educate people on environmental issues. There could also be a special yoga session for those who don't want to play games. This carnival could be a fun and educational way to celebrate Earth Day.

instruction:
Improve this technical documentation:
"Increase the mouse sensitivity settings"
output: To increase the mouse sensitivity settings, open the Control Panel and select "Mouse". Then, adjust the settings to your desired level. You may also want to adjust the double-click speed to make it easier to select items on the screen.

instruction: Can you think of a new idea for a mobile phone game?
output: How about a game where you play as a shepherd, who must guide and protect their flock of sheep against wolves, bears, and other predators? You can choose to build fences to create a safe zone for your flock, or you can build towers and walls to protect your flock from predators. You can also use weapons to drive away predators and complete various missions.

instruction: Could you compare and contrast two different types of learning styles
output: Visual learners and auditory learners are two common types of learning styles. Visual learners prefer to learn by seeing information either through diagrams, charts, or pictures. Auditory learners prefer to learn by listening, such as being auditory present in a lecture or seminar. Visual learners tend to receive and remember information best by seeing it, whereas auditory learners tend to remember information best by hearing it. Additionally, visual learners are often able to decode abstract concepts quickly, while auditory learners are better able to process and recall information in a linear and logical manner.

instruction: Explain why rainbows are curved.
output: Rainbows are curved because of the way light refracts in water droplets. When the light coming from the Sun passes through a raindrop, it is bent and separated into its component colors, forming a circular arc.

instruction: Detect if the following sentence contains any factual errors. Output 1 for error and 0 for no error.
input: The Australian Parliament is located in Sydney.

instruction: Create a poem of five lines with a unique rhyme scheme.
output:
In the glimmer of the night,
The stars gave a bright light,
Silver beams in the dark,
A beauty that can't spark,
The secrets of the night so stark.
